other_tests.findings: Clinical clearing of Hailey-Hailey disease (HHD) after 2 ALA-PDT sessions.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Both patients achieved clinical remission in the treated areas during a follow-up period of 19 and 25 months, respectively.

other_tests.findings: Histologic findings confirmed the diagnosis of Hailey-Hailey disease (HHD).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Two biopsy specimens taken after the second treatment showed normal epidermis.
